Package alex.emailer.Student

Class StudentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • alex.emailer.Student.StudentManager
  • public class StudentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all of the students in the classroom
    Author:
    Alex

      • ZIP_DESTINATION

        public static final java.lang.String ZIP_DESTINATION
        Location where zip file of student reports are to be unzipped to. This is the java temp directory

      • getInstance

        public static StudentManager getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance of StudentManager
        Returns:
        the instance

      • getZipDestination

        public java.lang.String getZipDestination()
        Gets the file location where the zip files will be unzipped to. Will be the java temp directory.
        Returns:
        the zip destination file location

      • getStartRow

        public int getStartRow()
        Gets the startRow. 1-indexed
        Returns:
        the start row

      • setStartRow

        public void setStartRow​(int startRow)
        Set the row where the student information will begin in the file. 1-indexed
        Parameters:
        startRow - the start row

      • getNameColumn

        public int getNameColumn()
        Gets the name column as an integer
        Returns:
        name column the name column

        Gets the name Column as a char
        Returns:
        the name column as a char

      • setNameColumn

        public void setNameColumn​(char nameColumn)
        Set the column where names will be in the file. Uses excel letter column names.
        Parameters:
        nameColumn - the name column

      • getEmailColumn

        public int getEmailColumn()
        Gets the email column as an integer
        Returns:
        emailColumn the email column

        Gets the email column as a char
        Returns:
        the email column as a char

      • setEmailColumn

        public void setEmailColumn​(char emailColumn)
        Set the column where emails will be in the file. Uses excel letter column names.
        Parameters:
        emailColumn - the email column

      • resetStartInfo

        public void resetStartInfo()
        Resets startRow, nameColumn, and emailColumn to their default values.

      • loadStudents

        public void loadStudents​(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads student information from an excel file and creates Student objects with the corresponding information. Students are then added to a list of students
        Parameters:
        filename - the location of the excel file

      • matchStudents

        public boolean matchStudents()
        Attempts to match all Students in students with a file located in zipPath that begins with "firstname lastname" Students that are matched are added to matchedStudents Students that are not matched are added to unmatchedStudents
        Returns:
        true if all Students find a match, false if any Student does not have a match

      • unzipFiles

        public void unzipFiles​(java.lang.String filename)
        Unzips directory containing student report files to zipPath.
        Parameters:
        filename - location of zip file to be unzipped

      • getUnmatchedFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> getUnmatchedFiles()
        Gets a list of the files in zipPath that have not been matched to a student in students
        Returns:
        unmatchedFiles the array list of unmatched files

      • emailStudents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Student> emailStudents()
        Sends email to all students in students with the corresponding file attachment.
        Returns:
        unsentStudents list of students who were unable to send to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if not all students have been matched with a report.

      • getStudents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getStudents()
        Gets the list of students
        Returns:
        the list of students

      • getStudentByName

        public Student getStudentByName​(java.lang.String firstName,
                                java.lang.String lastName)
        Gets a Student in students based on first and last name
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the student
        lastName - the last name of the student
        Returns:
        the student with matching first and last name, null if no student is found.

      • getUnmatchedStudents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getUnmatchedStudents()
        Gets a list of unmatched Students
        Returns:
        unmatchedStudents the unmatched Students

      • getMatchedStudents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getMatchedStudents()
        Gets the list of matched Students
        Returns:
        matchedStudents the matched Students

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent​(Student student)
        Adds a student to the list of students
        Parameters:
        student - the student to add

      • removeStudent

        public boolean removeStudent​(java.lang.String firstName,
                             java.lang.String lastName)
        Tries to remove a Student from students based on first and last name. Adds removed student to backup list of removed students
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the student
        lastName - the last name of the student
        Returns:
        true if student is found with matching names, false if no student is found

      • clearStudents

        public void clearStudents()
        Removes all students from students and adds them all to removed students

      • resetStudents

        public void resetStudents()
        Removes all students from students without adding them all to removed students

      • getRemovedStudents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getRemovedStudents()
        Gets a list of students that have been removed
        Returns:
        the removed students

      • setLoginInfo

        public void setLoginInfo​(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Set the username and password of the user For gmail, password will have to be an app password (found under security in manage account). May be similar for other email hosts
        Parameters:
        username - the user's username/email
        password - the user's password

      • setLoginInfo

        public void setLoginInfo​(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String host)
        Sets the username, password, and host of the user For gmail, password will have to be an app password (found under security in manage account). May be similar for other email hosts
        Parameters:
        username - the user's username/email
        password - the user's password
        host - the host address

      • reAddStudent

        public boolean reAddStudent​(Student student)
        Adds a student from removedStudents
        Parameters:
        student - the student to be readded
        Returns:
        true if student is in removedStudents, false if student was not in removedStudents

      • reAddAll

        public void reAddAll()
        Re-adds all students in removedStudents.
